segments.text: John , do you mind helping me prepare for the picnic ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Have you checked the weather report ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It says it will be sunny all day . No sign of rain at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like some toast and chicken wings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Please take some fruit salad and crackers for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Done . Oh , don't forget to take napkins , disposable plates , cups and picnic blanket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . We can also take the dragon kite with us . After the picnic , we can fly it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool , we can take shuttlecock and badminton racket .
segments.speaker: S2
